title: Robert Bosch GmbH
summary: Robert Bosch GmbH (/bɒʃ/; German: [bɔʃ] (listen)), commonly known as Bosch, is a German multinational engineering and technology company headquartered in Gerlingen. The company was founded by Robert Bosch in Stuttgart in 1886.[2] Bosch is 92% owned by Robert Bosch Stiftung, a charitable institution.[1]
